name: Pixel Run [Demo]
description:
Imagine a world... where the only thing you can do is run... and RUN!

Welcome to Pixel Run, a platform puzzle game where you need to escape the room facing different obstacles!

Windows:

  • Windows 7 or above
  • DirectX 11 or newer
  • A monitor with a minimum resolution of 1280x720
  • Minimum of 100MB Storage space
  • Intel HD Graphics or above
  • Minimum of 512MB RAM

Android:

  • Android 4.4 or above
  • OpenGL 2.0 or newer
  • Screen resolution of 1280x720
  • Minimum of 50MB Storage Space
  • Minimum of 512MB RAM
